‘The Road Between Us’: Former IDF general Noam Tibon says ‘proud’ to save people on Oct. 7 attack
Description
3 hours ago
At #TIFF2025, retired IDF general Noam Tibon said on Wednesday at the red carpet of 'The Road Between Us: The Ultimate Rescue' that he was "proud" to save everyone he met on the day of the Oct. 7 Hamas attack.
